General.Name: Ta Chen Stainless Pipe Co Ltd
General.Description: Ta Chen Stainless Pipe Co., Ltd. produces, processes, and sells stainless steel pipes, plates, fittings, and venetian blinds in Taiwan, the United States, China, and internationally. It operates in Stainless Steel and Aluminum, and Screws and Nuts segments. The company offers stainless flat rolled, pipes, valves, fittings, flanges, tubing, and casting and long products. It also engages in the manufacture and sale of aluminum products comprising aluminum products curtains, and aluminum flat rolled products; import, export, and sale of screws and nuts; manufacture and sale of curtains and decorations; manufacture and trade of engine and automobiles parts; production of connecting rods, and pistons for motorcycles, commercial vehicles, automobiles, etc.; and trading of automobiles. In addition, the company engages in investment, and interior design and renovation businesses, as well as provides energy technical services. It serves mechanics, industrial and construction materials, home decoration and auto, chemical, medical, mechanics, pharmaceutical, food and brewery industries, etc. Ta Chen Stainless Pipe Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 125, Xintian 2nd Street, Tainan City, Taiwan, 71752
